ai_explanation.introduction_japanese: 「集まる」は、イベントや待ち合わせ、祭りや公園などで人や虫が一か所に集まるとき、またお金や物が自然にたまるときによく使われる言葉です。
ai_explanation.introduction_english: The verb あつまる is commonly seen when people or animals come together at events, meetings, festivals, parks, or when things like money or items naturally accumulate.
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_japanese: 「集まる」は、誰かがその場に来て一緒になることや、物や数が自然にたまることを表す自動詞です。人が公園に集まったり、虫が木に集まったりします。
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word あつまる means that people or things come together or accumulate on their own. People can gather in a park, or insects can gather on a tree.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: The first kanji means 'gather'. It shows the idea of things or people coming together. In しゅうちゅう the kanji helps show focusing many things into one place, and in しゅうごう it gives the sense of people assembling together.

common_words: 集中 (しゅうちゅう): concentration
集合 (しゅうごう): gathering, meeting

synonyms: 集う : つどう : gather, assemble (people)
寄る : よる : come close, drop by
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of the あつまる are つどう and よる. つどう (集う) often sounds a bit more deliberate or formal, like people meeting for a purpose. よる can be more casual and can also mean to come close or drop by.
antonyms: 散る : ちる : scatter, fall apart
離れる : はなれる : move away, leave
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym[s] of the あつまる are ちる and はなれる. ちる means to scatter or fall apart, the opposite of coming together. はなれる means to move away or leave, so people or things stop being together.

examples.furigana: 友(とも)だちが集(あつ)まる。

translations.MY: သူငယ်ချင်းများစုဝေး။

examples.kanji: 公園に人が次々と集まる。
examples.furigana: 公園(こうえん)に人(ひと)が次々(つぎつぎ)と集(あつ)まる。

translations.EN: People gather in the park one after another.
translations.ID: Orang-orang berkumpul di taman satu demi satu.
translations.ES: La gente se reúne en el parque uno tras otro.
translations.VI: Mọi người tụ tập ở công viên từng người một.
translations.FR: Les gens se rassemblent dans le parc les uns après les autres.
translations.NE: मानिसहरू एकपछि अर्को पार्कमा भेला हुन्छन्।
translations.BN: একের পর এক পার্কে মানুষ জড়ো হচ্ছে।
translations.ZH: 人们陆续聚集在公园里。
translations.TL: Sunod-sunod na nagtitipon ang mga tao sa parke.
translations.MY: လူတွေက ပန်းခြံထဲမှာ တယောက်ပြီး တယောက် စုနေကြတယ်။
translations.HI: लोग एक के बाद एक पार्क में इकट्ठा होते हैं।
translations.AR: يتجمع الناس في الحديقة واحدًا تلو الآخر.
translations.FA: مردم یکی پس از دیگری در پارک جمع می‌شوند.

examples.furigana: 店(みせ)に客(きゃく)が集(あつ)まる。

translations.ES: Los clientes acuden en masa a la tienda.
translations.VI: Khách hàng đổ xô đến cửa hàng.
translations.FR: Les clients affluent vers le magasin.
translations.TL: Dumadagsa ang mga customer sa tindahan.
translations.MY: ဖောက်သည်များ စတိုးဆိုင်သို့ လာကြသည်။
translations.HI: ग्राहक दुकान पर उमड़ पड़ते हैं।

examples.furigana: 虫(むし)が木(き)に集(あつ)まる。

translations.ES: Los insectos se reúnen en el árbol.
translations.VI: Côn trùng tụ tập trên cây.
translations.FR: Les insectes se rassemblent sur l'arbre.
translations.TL: Nagtitipon ang mga insekto sa puno.
translations.MY: ပိုးမွှားများသည် သစ်ပင်ပေါ်တွင် စုဝေးကြသည်။
translations.HI: पेड़ पर कीड़े इकट्ठे हो जाते हैं।

examples.furigana: 学校(がっこう)で生徒(せいと)が集(あつ)まる。

translations.ES: Los estudiantes se reúnen en la escuela.
translations.VI: Học sinh tập trung tại trường.
translations.FR: Les étudiants se rassemblent à l'école.
translations.TL: Nagtitipon ang mga estudyante sa paaralan.
translations.HI: छात्र स्कूल में इकट्ठा होते हैं।

examples.kanji: 黒山のように人が集まる。
examples.furigana: 黒山(くろやま)のように人(ひと)が集(あつ)まる。

translations.EN: People gather like a black swarm.
translations.ES: La gente se reúne como un enjambre negro.
translations.VI: Mọi người tụ tập lại như một đàn đen.
translations.FR: Les gens se rassemblent comme un essaim noir.
translations.NE: मानिसहरू कालो झुण्ड जस्तै भेला हुन्छन्।
translations.BN: মানুষ কালো ঝাঁকের মতো জড়ো হয়।
translations.ZH: 人们像黑色的蜂群一样聚集。
translations.TL: Nagtitipon ang mga tao tulad ng isang itim na kuyog.
translations.MY: လူတို့သည် အနက်ရောင် ဝိုင်းအုံကဲ့သို့ စုဝေးကြသည်။
translations.HI: लोग काले झुंड की तरह इकट्ठा होते हैं।
translations.FA: مردم مثل یک گله سیاه جمع می‌شوند.

to gather (people, animals, crowd up).VI: tụ tập (người, động vật, đám đông)
to gather (people, animals, crowd up).FR: rassembler (des gens, des animaux, se rassembler)
to gather (people, animals, crowd up).NE: जम्मा हुनु (मानिसहरू, जनावरहरू, भीड जम्मा हुनु)
to gather (people, animals, crowd up).MY: (လူ၊ တိရိစ္ဆာန်၊ စုဝေးရန်)

to collect/accumulate (objects, things,.VI: thu thập/tích lũy (đồ vật, vật dụng, vật trừu tượng)
to collect/accumulate (objects, things,.FR: collectionner/accumuler (des objets, des choses, des éléments abstraits)
to collect/accumulate (objects, things,.ZH: 收集/积累（物体、事物、抽象物品）
to collect/accumulate (objects, things,.TL: upang mangolekta/mag-ipon (mga bagay, bagay, abstract na item)
to collect/accumulate (objects, things,.MY: စုဆောင်း/စုဆောင်းရန် (အရာဝတ္ထုများ၊ အရာများ၊ စိတ္တဇအရာများ)
to collect/accumulate (objects, things,.HI: (वस्तुएं, चीज़ें, अमूर्त वस्तुएं) इकट्ठा करना/संचित करना
to collect/accumulate (objects, things,.FA: جمع کردن/انباشت کردن (اشیاء، چیزها، اقلام انتزاعی)

collocations: 黒山のように人が集る
人だかりができて集る
